Gain Heart.name: Gain Heart
Gain Heart.flavor: You draw on the power of the earth to heal your wounds and lend weight to your attack.
Gain Heart.onHit: 3[W] damage. If you are bloodied when you use this power, you regain hit points equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier.

Earthsight.name: Earthsight
Earthsight.flavor: The earth speaks silently to you, telling you when a foe draws near no matter what might deceive your eyes.
Earthsight.effect: Until the end of your next turn, so long as you are touching the ground, you gain a +5 bonus on Perception checks and can see invisible creatures.

Earthsurge.name: Earthsurge
Earthsurge.flavor: You bring your weapon crashing down on the ground at your feet. The earth answers, roiling like a storm-tossed sea and hampering nearby foes.
Earthsurge.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. An enemy that begins its turn within 3 squares of you, or that moves to within 3 squares of you, is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Earthsurge.special: The zone always remains centered on you, even if you move after casting the spell.
